lore.block.aether_unity.golden_oak_leaf_: A pile of Golden Oak Leaves. These can be stacked on top of eachother to make various sizes!
lore.block.aether_unity.short_aether_gra: Blades of the Aether's grass. It feels slightly cool to the touch.
lore.block.aether_unity.skyroot_leaf_pil: A pile of Skyroot Leaves. These can be stacked on top of eachother to make various sizes!
